title: Virtual Reality-Based Soccer Referee Decision-Making Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Students perform the role of referees in VR simulation environments resembling real matches, receiving iterative feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can determine key foul situations with over 80% accuracy in a VR environment
Learners can replicate gaze patterns (search speed, fixation points, head movements) similar to actual games in VR training
Learners can select appropriate referee signals within 3 seconds in open-play scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
